section.name: JCR-Explorer Downloads
section.p: There are two different kinds of downloads availabe, the source package and the binary. They all can be found on our SourceForge download page.
The recommended download version is jcr-explorer-binary 0.9.5 .

section.name: JBoss-bundled Jumpstart Version
section.p: We are currently putting a Jumpstart version together, that is basically a JBoss AS bundled with a pre-configured Jackrabbit and the newest JCR-Explorer. Although it's not meant for production use, we made the experience that it's pretty nice to check out JCR. Stay tuned for that or contact us if you're interested in it...
